name: Train Blazer
description:
A game about placing tracks and extending your train with weapons to destroy enemy defences as you pass them to reach the other side of the map.

Controls

This game is playable with mouse only, but you can use keys 1 - 6 to place track segments.

Note: if you get stuck somewhere in the menus (like the How To Play screen), it's probably because the UI doesn't respond well to low resolutions. Try playing in fullscreen at 1080p or higher if you can!

Made for Godot Wild Jam 53.
